person.persName: John Bailey (Taylor County, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Sallie" Fisher Bailey in Taylor County in January 1850. Father of Samuel D. Bailey, Thomas T. Bailey, and William C. Bailey. Farmer in Taylor County in 1850. Employed Creed Watson and Preston Pike as farmers in Taylor County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Taylor County in 1860.
